SEARCH
Package env

Interface MapEnvironment

All Known Implementing Classes:
BlackForestEnvironment
public interface MapEnvironment
The MapEnvironment interface defines the necessary methods for interacting with the map environment in the game. Implementing classes must provide the logic for setting up and managing the environment for the agents to interact with.

The environment includes map initialization, agent placement, and environment updates.
